Title: Drishyam
Writer: Jeethu Joseph (original story), Upendra Sidhaye (adapted by), Raaju Bonagaani (associate screenplay)
Actors: Ajay Devgn, Shriya Saran, Tabu, Rajat Kapoor
Plot: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.
